fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Under a full moon you have basic defense.
- Under a Blood Moon you have powerful attack.
- Under no moon, you have no defense.
- Under a Blood Moon your defense is powerful.
- If you are jailed twice, you may issue your attack inside of jail.
- Roleblock Immunity.
- Detection Immunity during non-moon nights.
- Conversion Immunity
